Main

Class Planner

  • java.lang.Object
    • Main.Planner

  • public class Planner
extends java.lang.Object
    The Planner runs the main program. It instantiates the Controller and the View, then coordinates the communication betwenn the two of them!

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Planner() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addInitialData(int currSem, int maxCp, int maxH)
      Your View can (and should) deliver the initial Data with this Method!
      static void doReorganize()
      Reorganizes the studium with the user-input
      static void exchangeViews()
      Kills the current view and Exchanges it with the initial View!
      static int getCpMax()
      Helper-Function for my version of the view
      static int getHMax()
      Helper-Function for my version of the view
      static java.lang.String getModulToShift() 
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Call this method to start the program.
      static java.lang.String requestPopup(java.lang.String module)
      Helper Function if you want to visualize Tipps the mentoringTeam gives you!
      static void resetStudium()
      Resets everything except for the initial choices of maximal credits, houres, semester, etc.
      static void setModulToShift(java.lang.String text)
      Sets the Modul that can be shifted afterwards with the Method "shiftModule"
      static void shiftModule(java.lang.String dir)
      Pushes the selected Modul to the next ("Right") free Semester (or to the last free Semester "Left")
      static void stop()
      Kills your current View!
      static void updateAbsolved(java.lang.String text)
      The Modul that has the same name as "text" will be set Absolved/Not Absolved
